radiographic_examinations.findings: demonstrated a low probability for pulmonary embolism
revealed a lesion suggestive of an abscess in the right parietal region of the motor cortex
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: showed a new intracerebral hemorrhage and further documented almost complete resolution of the previous abscess

radiographic_examinations.findings: revealed the presence of an extracardiac shunt

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: lung scanning with technetium Tc 99m macroaggregated albumin
radiographic_examinations.findings: showed increased uptake in the brain, salivary glands, thyroid, enlarged spleen, kidneys, and intestines; findings further confirmed the presence of a pulmonary shunt
failed to show any macroscopic anatomic shunt-producing lesions
